casebody.data:
ANNA SCHLEY ABELL v. WALTER W. ABELL, Surviving Trustee, et al. Decided February 19th, 1926.

The petition was argued before Bond, C. J., Pattison, Urner, Adkins, Offutt, Digges, Parke, and Walsii, JJ.

John Henry Lewin, for the petitioner. Bond, C. J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court, dismissing the petition.
